pages.text: $(li)The Looting enchantment can be applied in any kind of $(l:patchouli:weapons/wooden_sword)Sword$(/l), $(l:patchouli:weapons/wooden_axe)Axe$(/l) or any kind of tool that can be used as a Melee Weapon.$(br)$(li)This enchantment increases the possibility of drop more items when they are defeated.
pages.title: Looting

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level III.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level IV of this enchantment using an Ancient Tome (Looting).
